content:
It's great that you're on top of Luna's medication schedule. Remembering to reorder medication can be a crucial task, and it's wonderful that you're taking care of your furry friend's needs.

Make sure to double-check your notes or calendar to confirm the details, such as the medication name, dosage, and any specific instructions from your veterinarian. It's also a good idea to call ahead and confirm the reorder process with the pharmacy or veterinarian's office to ensure a smooth transaction during your lunch break.

If you have any questions or concerns about Luna's medication or health, don't hesitate to reach out to your veterinarian for guidance. They're always there to help you provide the best care for your beloved pet.

Have a great day, and I hope everything goes smoothly with the medication reorder!
